pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Build time environment variables
LIRI_SHELL_DEFAULT_ICON_THEME - Force this icon theme. The theme must match one of the names in /usr/share/icons.
LIRI_SHELL_PINNED_LAUNCHERS - A space delimited list to appear in the launcher taskbar. Setting this will override the default. You may set this value to REMOVE_ALL to delete all pinned launchers. You may use one of the names in /usr/share/applications without the .desktop portion.
Examples:
LIRI_SHELL_PINNED_LAUNCHERS="io.liri.Terminal io.liri.Settings"
LIRI_SHELL_DATE_TIME_FORMAT - A format specifier to customize the date time format. See links below.
https://doc.qt.io/qt-6/qdatetime.html#toString https://doc.qt.io/qt-6/qdate.html#toString https://doc.qt.io/qt-6/qtime.html#toString
Examples:
LIRI_SHELL_DATE_TIME_FORMAT="ddd MMM dd hh:mm:ss"
Per user customization
To reset pinned launchers:
gsettings reset io.liri.desktop.panel pinned-launchers
To add/remove pinned launchers:
gsettings set io.liri.desktop.panel pinned-launchers ['app1', 'app2', 'app3'] gsettings set io.liri.desktop.panel pinned-launchers ['app1'] (The same as /usr/share/applications but without the .desktop suffix.)
To remove all pinned launchers:
gsettings set io.liri.desktop.panel pinned-launchers []
To set icon theme:
gsettings set io.liri.desktop.interface icon-theme 'Paper' (The same as /usr/share/icons.)
